Replying to @brianleroux 2018-01-04 23:38
@brianleroux Yes. That's where a term like #jamstack can be useful. As the ecosystem of static hosting, automation & microservices gets richer, we can go beyond what we thought of as the limits of static sites. @smashingmag's move from lots of stacks to jamstack on @netlify is a good example
